column4: I'm installing Ubuntu onto an acer Aspire 1360 for a family member. However, I can't access wireless networking on it. "lshw -C network" identifies everything correctly but Administration > Network only shows wired and modem. Any thoughts? It's using a VT6102 Rhine II and an AirConn IPN 2220 Wireless Adaptor
thats because they are not your wirless cards
you don't have any drives for your card
